titleStmt.title: The boke of keruynge
Here begynneth the boke of kervynge.

publicationStmt.publisher: Enprynted by wynkyn de worde at London in fletestrete at the sygne of the sonne,
publicationStmt.date: The yere of our lorde god. M.CCCCC.xiij. [1513]]

notesStmt.note: An edition of: Here begynneth the boke of kervynge.
